DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether three generic nevirapine-based antiretroviral regimen effective treatment Acquired immune deficiency syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Three Generic Nevirapine-Based Antiretroviral Treatments Chinese Patients : Multicentric Observation Cohort
DOC.criteria: 18 year old subject HIVseropositive standard serum enzymelinked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) test also Western blot analysis subject antiretroviral drugnaïve baseline CD4+ Tcell count 100 350 cells/mm3 baseline plasma viral load 500copies/ml pregnancy breastfeeding anticipate nonadherence AIDSdefining illness within 2 week entry white blood cell count less 2.0×109/L , absolute neutrophil count less 1.0×109/L , hemoglobin level less 90g/l , platelet count le 0.75×1012/L transaminase alkaline phosphatase level 3 time upper limit normal range , bilirubin level 2.5times upper limit normal range , serum creatinine level 1.5 time upper limit normal range
